meanings.sent1: The irretrievability of the lost toy made the child sad.
meanings.sent2: The irretrievability of the deleted file was frustrating.
meanings.sent3: The irretrievability of the misplaced keys led to a frantic search.
meanings.sent4: The irretrievability of time wasted cannot be underestimated.
meanings.sent5: The irretrievability of the treasure buried deep in the ocean haunted the pirate's dreams.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to be recovered or restored.
meanings.sent1: The irretrievability of the broken vase saddened the owner.
meanings.sent2: The irretrievability of the lost memories pained her heart.
meanings.sent3: The irretrievability of the burnt toast caused laughter in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The irretrievability of trust once broken is like shattered glass.
meanings.sent5: The irretrievability of the sunken ship left historians puzzled for years.
